document_data.name: Bella don Delroy Harpell
document_data.mainbody: '''Bella don Delroy Harpell''' was a member of the [[Harpell]] family and daughter of spokesman [[Delroy Harpell]] of [[Longsaddle]] in the [[Savage Frontier]] of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Description: Beautiful Bella was short (barely five feet) with one bright green eye and one dull green eye that looked in different directions.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], Bella journeyed with [[Harkle Harpell|Harkle]], [[Regweld Harpell|Regweld]], and [[Bidderdoo Harpell]] to help defend [[Mithral Hall]].
